entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-640}{F813,0,184001}You young ones who command demons...{F801}I have been awaiting you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-640}{F813,0,184001}You young ones who command demons...{F801}I have been awaiting you.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,214}{F813,0,184002}Whether the power you seek will be used{F801}for the sake of my country or not...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,214}{F813,0,184002}Whether the power you seek will be used{F801}for the sake of my country or not...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Domain's seal is broken. The demon{F801}turned to stone...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Domain's seal is broken. The demon{F801}turned to stone...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,184004}When the incompetent are given power,{F801}it only leads to the suffering of the{F801}people...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,184004}When the incompetent are given power,{F801}it only leads to the suffering of the{F801}people...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,184005}Thank you, Michizane. You have taught{F801}me a valuable lesson.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,12,1,1}{F813,0,184005}Thank you, Michizane. You have taught{F801}me a valuable lesson.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The demon is no longer here...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The demon is no longer here...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Tobiume's Shoot started to shine in your hand...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Tobiume's Shoot started to shine in your hand...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,458004}I am the Famed Michizane, one of the{F801}fierce National Defense Divinities.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,458004}I am the Famed Michizane, one of the{F801}fierce National Defense Divinities.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Michizane\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,458003}Wherever my medium is, so too is{F801}my thunder. Therefore, I recognize{F801}you as my master.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,458010}I am honored to meet you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Michizane\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,458003}Wherever my medium is, so too is{F801}my thunder. Therefore, I recognize{F801}you as my master.{F801}{F802}{F813,1,458010}I am honored to meet you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The rock that was once Michizane is{F801}sitting in front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The rock that was once Michizane is{F801}sitting in front of you...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,214}{F813,0,184003}I, the thunder god Michizane of the{F801}deadly National Defense Divinities,{F801}shall gauge you.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,214}{F813,0,184003}I, the thunder god Michizane of the{F801}deadly National Defense Divinities,{F801}shall gauge you.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The atmosphere in the area seems to{F801}have changed...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The atmosphere in the area seems to{F801}have changed...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 A voice emanates from the stone in{F801}front of you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 A voice emanates from the stone in{F801}front of you...{F801}
